desc:
40% boost to all parameters, hugely boosts Spark damage, Spark damage hugely boosts BC, HC drop rates & greatly restores HP each turn
Guild Skill: Adds considerably reduces damage from all types for 1 turn effect to SBB & boosts Spark damage when HP is full
lore: A crystal orb set in gold, this sphere was created to celebrate one's ascension to power in dazzling style. Imbued with a wide array of powerful strengths, one who holds this can surely make the heavens shake if they desired it
name: Jubilee Orb
